Changelog
=========

0.3.1 (2008-11-06)
------------------

* switching to a one-portlet-per-language implementation

0.3.0 (2008-11-04)
------------------

* switching to a one-portlet-per-language implementation


0.2.0 (2008-10-31)
------------------

* now support for up to 3 different languages


0.1.0 (2008-10-28)
------------------

* Initial release
